overview_of_class: As use of medicinal plants has increased in the West, there has been heightened interest in the possible beneficial effects of marijuana. In this course we will explore this subject largely from a biological point of view, but also touch on the legal and societal ramifications of legalizing marijuana for medicinal use in the US. Topics covered include historical medicinal uses of marijuana, the efficacy of marijuana for various conditions and diseases, and societal impact of medical marijuana.
